Assignment: 
 [[0 0 0]
 [0 0 0]
 [0 0 0]]
Sigma: 
 [[0 0 1]
 [0 1 0]
 [1 0 0]]

| Function 1 |  0   |  0   |  0   |   0   |   0   |    1    |

Assignment: 
 [[ 0  0  0]
 [ 0  1 -1]
 [ 1  0 -1]]
Sigma: 
 [[ 0  1  0]
 [ 1  0  0]
 [ 1  1 -1]]


+------------+------+------+------+-------+-------+---------+
|  Function  | {1,} | {2,} | {3,} | {1,2} | {2,3} | {1,2,3} |
+------------+------+------+------+-------+-------+---------+
| Function 2 |  0   |  0   |  -1  |   1   |   0   |    1    |
